Class YellowState

java.lang.Object
YellowState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class YellowState
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
This class represents the case where the yellow light is on

    This method switches the light to green It can't switch its light to green from yellow directly, so this method is empty in this class

    This method switches the light to red
